CustomField.formula: IF ( Violation_Age__c <= 7, '1. < 7 days', IF ( Violation_Age__c > 7 && Violation_Age__c <= 30, '2. 8 - 30 days', IF ( Violation_Age__c > 30 && Violation_Age__c <= 90, '3. 31 - 90 days', IF ( Violation_Age__c > 90 && Violation_Age__c <= 180, '4. 90 - 180 days', IF ( Violation_Age__c > 180, '5. > 180 days', null ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Lifetime Interval
